title: Enchilada Lasagna
directions: *Brown beef with onion and garlic. Add tomatoes, enchilada sauce and cumin. Bring to a boil and then turn down to low and simmer for 20 minutes. In a separate bowl, combine egg and cottage cheese. In a 9X13 pan, spread 1/2 of the meat sauce. Layer with 1/2 of cheese, 1/2 of tortillas and 1/2 of cottage cheese. Repeat layers and sprinkle with a little more cheese. Bake at 350 for 15 minutes covered with foil and 15 minutes uncovered.
*A couple of our kids didnâ€™t like the tomato chunks, so next time I might try tomato sauce or tomato soup in the meat mixture.
ingredients: 3 cups shredded cheese (I used sharp cheddar)
